md:
giải nghĩa từ "handing" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan và các từ trái nghĩa.

* Handing (verb)
	+ Meaning: Đưa, truyền, giao, trao
	+ Example: She was handing out flyers to promote the new product.
	+ Related words: hand, give, pass, deliver
	+ Antonyms: taking, receiving, holding

* Handing (noun)
	+ Meaning: Việc đưa, truyền, giao, trao
	+ Example: The handing over of the documents was a formal process.
	+ Related words: delivery, transfer, transmission, presentation
	+ Antonyms: receiving, taking, holding

Note: The verb "handing" can also be used in the context of assisting or helping someone, in which case the meaning would be "giúp đỡ" or "hỗ trợ". For example: "She was handing him a glass of water."
